setBearingLayoutId(int) - Method in class com.wuyr.fanlayout.FanLayout

setItemAddDirection(int) - Method in class com.wuyr.fanlayout.FanLayout

setItemAngleOffset(float) - Method in class com.wuyr.fanlayout.FanLayout
指定Item的偏移角度 FanLayout.LayoutMode = FanLayout.MODE_FIXED 时有效
setItemDirectionFixed(boolean) - Method in class com.wuyr.fanlayout.FanLayout

setItemLayoutMode(int) - Method in class com.wuyr.fanlayout.FanLayout
item的布局方式: 默认: FanLayout.MODE_AVERAGE(平均) 如设置为fixed需指定 FanLayout.setItemAngleOffset(float)

setScrollAvailabilityRatio(float) - Method in class com.wuyr.fanlayout.FanLayout
